Package main

Class GameManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.GameManager
  • public class GameManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that essentially runs the entire GUI game by handling the creation and removal of GUI windows. Also stores all the player data (farm, crops, animals, money etc.) required by the GUI windows in question. This is the GUI version of GameCLI.java, which no longer exists but used a command-line interface.
    Author:
    Grant and Nick

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      int dayNumber
      The day number of the game.
      Farm farm
      Farm stores all the player data, like what the player has on the farm.
      Farmer farmer
      Farmer stores all the high-level actions that the player can run.
      FarmGUI farmWindow
      An instance of the main farm GUI window, included here as it is passed around classes.
      int maxDays
      Total duration of the game; some integer between 5 and 10 inclusive.
      int score
      The score, calculated at the very end.

      • closeStoreScreen

        public void closeStoreScreen​(StoreGUI storeScreen)
        Closes the store window and updates the "Actions Left" label in the main farm window in case any changes to the farm have been made (i.e. player purchases).
        Parameters:
        storeScreen - the store window to close

      • closeFeedingScreen
